title: Drunk
lyrics:
[Chorus]
Wavy, grab a cup, sip something
Set the mood right
Drunken, bet you I could fuck you crazy
With this Rosé, underneath the moonlight
Aye
[Verse 1]
Moisturize me
Swimmin' to the ocean floor (Huh, huh, huh, huh, huh)
Hypnotize me
Does this body make you want some more? (Huh, huh, huh, huh, huh)
I'm so numb, but it feel right (Huh, huh, huh, huh, huh)
This that poison that I like, I like
Yah, yah, yah, yah, yah (Huh, huh, huh, huh, huh)
Yeah, you want Henny? I got plenty
I got many more, yeah
Don't try to cop the phantom without Danny, yeah
Twinkle, twinkle little star
In that Fenty glow, yeah
She got titties, they got Fendi
They come with me, yeah, aye
Designated, I'm so faded with my ladies, uh, wait
Sweat it out, hair so frizzy
I feel eightie's, yeah, aye
Club so busy, we get busy
I feel dizzy, yeah, aye
He feel tipsy
He want Doja, Doja kitty, yeah

[Chorus]
Wavy, grab a cup, sip something
Set the mood right
Drunken, bet you I could fuck you crazy
With this Rosé, underneath the moonlight
[Verse 2]
(Fresher)
Blue Hawaiian, so he eyein'
Long Island, now he smilin'
White Russian, now he crushin' (Huh, huh, huh, huh, huh)
One Mai Tai, now he my guy
Margarita, make it sweeter
One Mimosa, he comin' over
Two Smirnoffs with his shirt off (Huh, huh, huh, huh, huh)
Martinis keep it neat, I need the dirt off
Hanky-Panky, he wanna spank me
Mojito, he a freak though
Old fashioned, now he smashin' (Huh, huh, huh, huh, huh)
This sugar all over that glass rim
Come shimmy on over, you crashin'
No fruit in my drink, I got passion
You do it so good, do you practice? (Huh, huh, huh, huh, huh)
Tell Morgan I found a new captain
[Chorus]
Wavy, grab a cup, sip something
Set the mood right
Drunken, bet you I could fuck you crazy
With this Rosé, underneath the moonlight
